docs.abstract: She was a healthy 35-year-old when she fell ill with a series of symptoms, including crimson blistering on her face and body.
docs.snippet: She was a healthy 35-year-old when she fell ill with a series of symptoms, including crimson blistering on her face and body.
docs.lead_paragraph: The woman watched the streetlights flash by as the ambulance carried her through the midnight roads of her hometown, Bay City, Mich., to Karmanos Cancer Institute in Detroit. Her husband was in the front seat talking with the driver. He wasn’t allowed to ride in the back with her. But he had been at her side for the past four weeks, ever since she found out she had ulcerative colitis.

headline.main: The Doctors Believed That the Woman Had Leukemia. But Could That Explain Her Horrible Rash?
headline.print_headline: The Doctors Believed That the Woman Had Leukemia. But Could That Explain Her Horrible Rash?

docs.abstract: The disease should have dried him out, yet his body was producing liter after liter of excess fluid. Why?
docs.snippet: The disease should have dried him out, yet his body was producing liter after liter of excess fluid. Why?
docs.lead_paragraph: They weren’t looking for a diagnosis, the middle-aged woman explained. Her husband had a diagnosis. They just wanted help figuring out why, even with all the treatments he was getting, he wasn’t getting better.

headline.main: He Thought He Just Had the Flu at First. Then His Heart Could Barely Pump.
headline.print_headline: The disease should have dried him out, yet his body was producing liter after liter of excess fluid. Why?

docs.abstract: At least 78 pro-government forces and 23 civilians were killed in Afghanistan during the past week.
docs.snippet: At least 78 pro-government forces and 23 civilians were killed in Afghanistan during the past week.
docs.lead_paragraph: At least 78 pro-government forces and 23 civilians were killed in Afghanistan during the past week. The deadliest attack took place in the area of Sorkhsang in Arghandab District, Zabul Province, where 14 police officers were killed and four others were wounded in Taliban assaults on three outposts. Two outposts collapsed to the Taliban during the fighting. The Times also confirmed seven incidents in Takhar Province, in Northern Afghanistan, a number of which were tied to an offensive launched by security forces to clear the Taliban in Dasht-e-Qala District this week. In Helmand, at least 10 civilians were killed by American airstrikes in Sangin District, among them women and children.
